summary: This bill, the DEVICE Act of 2025, amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to enhance medical device communication and ensure device cleanliness. It mandates reporting requirements for design changes and reprocessing instructions for medical devices, as well as communications to foreign healthcare providers regarding device changes or safety concerns. Additionally, the bill includes rapid assessment tests for reusable devices within the definition of a device and requires the Secretary to develop and publish a list of types of rapid assessment tests and their reporting requirements.
